sentence.Network_en: From that it followed logically that he would not be meeting Hildegarde.
sentence.Network_cn: 由此，他不去见希尔德加德便是顺理成章的事了。

sentence.Network_en: My professional training has taught me to look at things logically.
sentence.Network_cn: 专业训练使我懂得看问题要讲求逻辑。

sentence.Network_en: There is no logically compelling argument to support their claims.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有任何逻辑上有说服力的论据来支持他们的主张.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语必修2_百度百科 ... logical adj. 合逻辑的；合情理的 logically adv. 逻辑上；合逻辑地；有条理地 loss n. 损失；遗失；丧失.
因为法律只要找到事实就可以了,而历史呢,涉及意识形态也就涉及哲学(Philosophy),找到事实对方还不一定信服,必须要将事实重新组织,有逻辑地(logically)说服对方,这点.

entry.tran: 逻辑（上）的；（论证或推理方法）符合逻辑的
entry.def: In a logical argument or method of reasoning, each step must be true if the step before it is true.

example.ex: Only when each logical step has been checked by other mathematicians will the proof be accepted.
example.tran: 只有每一逻辑步骤都被其他数学家验证之后，证明才能成立。

entry.tran: （结论或结果）逻辑上必然的，顺理成章的
entry.def: The logical conclusion or result of a series of facts or events is the only one which can come from it, according to the rules of logic.

example.ex: If the climate gets drier, then the logical conclusion is that even more drought will occur...
example.tran: 如果气候变得更干燥，必然会出现更多旱情。

example.ex: ...this is the logical result of a long evolution in which we moved from working by the sweat of our brow and by muscle to industrial work and finally to knowledge work.
example.tran: 这是长期进化的必然结果；在这一过程中，我们首先从事汗流浃背的体力劳动，然后是工业劳动，最后发展到脑力劳动。

entry.def: Something that is logical seems reasonable or sensible in the circumstances.

example.ex: Connie suddenly struck her as a logical candidate...
example.tran: 她突然想到康妮是个合适人选。

sentences.sentence: "logically, you should now do the same to him"

auth_sentence.content: It's a very pure and logically constructed language.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a very pure and logically constructed language.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a very pure and logically constructed language.

auth_sentence.content: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.

auth_sentence.content: Technology can easily solve the problem if logically deployed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Technology can easily solve the problem if logically deployed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Technology can easily solve the problem if logically deployed.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加

like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

sentences.en: He can logically infer that if the battery is dead then the horn will not sound.
sentences.cn: 他可以符合逻辑地推测,如果蓄电池用完了,喇叭也就不会响了。

sentences.en: The total amount can be deduced logically from the figures available.
sentences.cn: 总量可以从现有的数字中按照逻辑推断出来。

sentences.en: There is no logically compelling argument to support their claims.
sentences.cn: 没有任何逻辑上有说服力的论据来支持他们的主张。

sentences.en: This explanation fits the facts and is psychologically plausible.
sentences.cn: 这一解释与事实相符，从心理角度看也有理。
